name: Rose Bullet
description:
Rose Bullet is a Highly stylized, Comic-Style, Retro gameplay, Horror RPG!

♦ STORY:

Play as a vampire hunter on his way to kill the count and avenge his lost lover.
Challenge fate while exploring the deadly manor, Slay creatures of the night in turn-based combat, overcome death, and unlock several different endings!

♦ GAMEPLAY:


Rose Bullet features a mix of Point-and-Click and RPG gameplay!

♦ COMBAT:




Experience turn-based combat in a comic-style format and some twists!

♦ CARDS OF FATE:



Test your luck with the Cards of Fate! Outcomes range from favorable to fatal!

FEATURES:
- Explore and survive a variety of horror-themed areas.
- Challenging turn-based combat.
- Handcrafted artwork and 2D pixel art.
- Over 20 different endings.
- 'Safe Streaming' mode that toggles off mature content.
